action.label: if hide value is not true

skuid__text.contents: You haven't created any variables yet.

Environment variables are values stored as labeled references within a Skuid environment. They can make deployments between environments much simpler.
For more information, see our environment variables documentation.

Environment variables are values stored as labeled references in this Skuid environment. These variables allow you to store information in a centralized location, as opposed to hardcoding values in various areas.

For more information, see our environment variables documentation.

Environment variables are values stored as labeled references in this Skuid environment. these variables allow you to store information in a centralized location, as opposed to hardcoding values in various areas.

For more information, see our environment variables documentation.

action.label: if variable is not using default data service
If variable is used in a usage record, don't continue with the deletion

skuid__text.contents: This environment variable is referenced by one or more datasources. You must remove the environment variable from the datasource(s) before it can be deleted.
Data source(s) using this environment variable:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this environment variable? You can't undo this.

action.label: if the user wants to create and save another variable
